Reviews.Title: My Wifes Phone
Reviews.Author: Milton Wade
Reviews.Content: I don't want to sound sexist, my wife just has refused to move in to the modern day when it comes to cell phones. The most basic the better and this phone is a step above that. My wife does not text or take photos, she can read a text but that is the limits, she is not stupid it is her choice. She complained this phone was too complicated, she has since learned to use it enough to get by.The charger broke the first day we got it, contacted the seller and they sent 2 additional charges. I am satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: hsc
Reviews.Content: don't care about "smart phones". These phones are excellent. The work well and are the perfect pocket size. They also have a camera and are bluetooth compatible.

Reviews.Title: Samsung SGH-A237 no contract phone
Reviews.Author: wakebreaker
Reviews.Content: It works fine, and for the money I can't complain. I can't wait until I can upgrade with AT&T; but this phone should get me through until then.
